name: Stepping Backward Through A Star
description:
Part 1

Explore a world composed by Dr. Francis Von Morgenvelt & his Torsionic Soliton. Soul is at a premium these days and we are unable, at this time, to provide faster movement through the Soliton.

The BBRBZ formula is set to play for 30 minutes. Good luck.

(Sorry for the load time. If you only knew...)

- Father Alexander.
